content: Add accessor field to PathKind enum variants
Implement PathKind smart constructors with formatting
Update struct_builder to use PathKind constructors

Run build-check.sh and fix any compilation errors
Run cargo clippy and fix warnings
Run cargo nextest run to verify no test breakage
